oai_dc:dc.dc:description: li-Muḥammad al-Qāwūqjī al-Ṭarābulusī al-Shāmī al-shahīr bi-Abī al-Maḥāsin.

"Wa-huwa sifr jalīl yaḥtawī ʻalá Bayān ādāb al-sūlūk wa-al-taslīk fī al-ṭarīqah al-Shādhilīyah al-ʻalīyah khuṣūṣan wa-ghayrihā ʻumūman wa-mā yanbaghī al-ʻamal bi-hi min al-awrād wa-al-adʻīyah wa-al-adhkār wa-mā fī dhālika min al-ādāb wa-al-asrār."
